title: Free Skin?
body: Two of my friends got Project Zed for free. When they logged in there was no sign you normally get when you are gifted. Anyone know why they got free skins? {{champion:238}}

replies.body: If you can get pictures of it, then you can believe them

No I assure you this promo is legit. I myself got project Zed for free too. I think it was something to do with playing on the starriest night of the 3rd fall of winter or something like that idk you'd have to ask someone that actually knows.
no they didn't, they're lying to you
